Text: Ọ bụ ihe ọma ị hụrụ ya.

English: Yes, I am going to the market.

Text: Ṣé o lè sọ ní kás?
Ṣé o ní èyí tó bá pọ̀?
English: Do you have the same thing?

Text: Bawo ni ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ n lọ?

English: May it be well with you.

Text: Ṣé o mọ ibi tí o fẹ́ lọ?
English: Do you know where you're going?
Please, go to the chief's place.
Are you going to the market?
It's a good day in this world.
What will you do in the morning?

Text: Ị chọrọ ihe ọ bụla ọzọ?

English: I will do it after work.
